site.name: Blue
site.description: Blue is a powerful platform to create, manage, and scale processes.
site.author: Blue Team

home.title: Blue - Powerful Process Management Platform
home.description: Blue revolutionizes how teams collaborate and manage their work. Built for the modern workplace, our platform combines powerful project management tools with intuitive design.

about.title: About Blue - Modern Team Collaboration Platform
about.description: Learn more about Blue and how we're revolutionizing team collaboration and process management for modern workplaces.

company/about.title: About
company/about.description: Discover Blue's mission to transform how teams work together and manage their processes with our innovative platform.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the Blue plan that fits your team's needs. Simple, transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Start your free trial today.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Stay up to date with the latest features and improvements in Blue.

resources/faq.title: FAQ
resources/faq.description: Frequently asked questions about Blue. Find answers to common questions about our platform, features, and pricing.

platform/status.title: System Status
platform/status.description: Monitor Blue's platform status and service uptime in real-time. View the current operational status and 90-day uptime history for all Blue services including API, web app, and background services.

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: Stay informed with Blue's latest insights on process management, product updates, engineering practices, and modern workplace trends. Expert perspectives on scaling teams and optimizing workflows.

platform/roadmap.title: Product Roadmap
platform/roadmap.description: Track Blue's development progress and see what's coming next. View upcoming features, current development status, and planned improvements to the platform.

customers.title: Our Customers
customers.description: Watch real customer testimonials and success stories.

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Blue is designed to scale with your business. We've built a platform that can handle the most complex workflows and processes.

brand.title: Brand Guidelines
brand.description: Explore Blue's brand guidelines including typography, visual identity, and brand assets. Learn how to properly use Blue's brand elements.

company.title: Company
company.description: Learn about Blue's company, our team, and our mission to revolutionize process management for modern teams.

solutions/industry/solopreneurs.title: Project Management for Solopreneurs
solutions/industry/solopreneurs.description: Streamline your solo business with Blue's powerful project management platform. Manage clients, projects, tasks, and workflows in one simple solution designed for solopreneurs.

defaults.description: Blue - Powerful platform to create, manage, and scale processes for modern teams.
